item.title: How would i
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

[quote=“joshlolzorzfuckinpwnzz, post:9, topic:184134”][quote author=warlock 999 link=topic=245810.msg2072970#msg2072970 date=1203825464]
NPCHandler.java:674: cannot find symbol
symbol : method additem(int,int)
location: class NPCHandler
additem (6570, 1);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

[/quote]

Try …

additem(6570, 1);

Instead of…

additem (6570, 1);

Notice the gap after "additem and (6570, 1);
…

Did it work?[/quote]no, that wouldnt work. goddess, i looked up the void and still got errors [code]NPCHandler.java:671: cannot find symbol
symbol : method addItem(int,int)
location: class NPCHandler
addItem(6570, 1);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 23, 2008, 05:31:40 PM[/size][hr]dang, this is all i need for full fight caves.

…

Did it work?

int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

                            ppl.teleportToX = 2733;
                            ppl.teleportToY = 3465;
                            ppl.additem 6570, 1;
